content.detailedDescription: I was visiting the country of iran, driving back on the passenger side of the car going from the city of isfahan to the city of tehran when i noticed some odd vertical dust lines in the horizon something that i never seen before, i decided to take a picture of the event, i did not noticed at the time i only saw it after i came back to my hotel room and saw the picture.I was able to take 2 pictures of the object and 4 more from the odd vertical lines that actually shifted angles after the object passed by.
content.summary: Driving in the highway and noticed unusual dust lines on the horizon object was seen after i took the picture

content.detailedDescription:
30 mai 2016 20:05
mon conjoint et moi, on venait de terminer de faire notre ã©picerie au super c sur la rue champfleury ã  quã©bec. on attendait le taxi. je regardais le ciel qui ã©tait nuageux, comme je fais souvent, au cas oã¹, lorsque j'ai vu un objet qui volait juste sous les nuages et qui semblait glisser dans les airs. j'ai cru que c'ã©tait un oiseau mais je ne voyais pas de battements d'ailes, puis j'ai pensã© ã  un petit avion. il ã©tait complã¨tement gris, un gris mã©tallique mã¢t. je ne suis pas capable d'ã©valuer ã  quelle hauteur mais il semblait ãªtre au-dessus du boulevard henri-bourassa, arrivant sur ma gauche, comme si il allait en direction de lorretteville. nous on ã©tait dehors en avant du magasin.
je ne voyais aucune composante d'un avion, soit ailes, gouvernail. il n'y avait aucun bruit. en fait, il ressemblait ã  une soucoupe. l'objet s'en allait en oblique pour se rendre sur ma droite en s'ã©loignant. alors j'ai demandã© ã  l'engin, dans ma tãªte, de se rapprocher pour que je le vois mieux. il a immã©diatement changã© de cap pour venir dans ma direction. il a tournã© sur un axe assez court pour un avion, en tournant il s'est lã©gã¨rement inclinã© et j'ai vu le dessous un peu, c'ã©tait plat mais avec une lã©gã¨re courbure, toujours sans bruit et est venu juste un peu plus prã¨s mais toujours en restant ã  la mãªme hauteur. il a fait une courbe que je pensais un peu serrã©e pour un petit avion, puis a passã© tout droit devant moi, a dã©crit ensuite un cercle pour aller sur ma droite et est parti droit devant pendant quelques secondes puis il a tout simplement disparu d'un coup.
je me suis senti trã¨s serein et aussi, fascinã© et content lorsque j'examinais l'engin et, dans mon fort intã©rieur, je savais ce que je regardais. c'est comme si instinctivement, je savais ã  qui j'avais affaire et que j'en ã©tais aucunement effrayã©. je ressentais comme un sentiment de familiaritã©.
l'engin ã©tait de la forme d'un disque, gris mã©tallique mã¢t. pas de lumiã¨re mais il avait une petite coupole sur le dessus. il ne semblait pas voler comme un avion mais plutã´t, il semblait glisser avec une aisance hors du commun. j'en ai parlã© ã  mon conjoint mais il ne l'a pas vu. moi qui pensais avoir un sentiment de peur lorsque j'assisterais ã  un phã©nomã¨ne ovni.
mais ã©videmment je peux me tromper.
je suis ã  la fois perplexe et rassurã© face ã  ma rã©action envers l'engin.
content.summary: Objet qui semblait glisser dans l'air en direction nord-ouest je crois, gris mã¢t, aucun son, de la forme d'un disque

content.detailedDescription:
The object shown in the attachments were recorded by nasa next to the sun on the above date. i was looking at some past images from the soho satellite today and noticed the object positioned to the lower left of the sun.

i was intrigued enough to analyse the image further and the result leads me to strongly suspect that the object is not any naturally derived phenomenon. in other words it could be a craft of some sort.

it appears to have wing-like structures.

the image is blurry, but nevertheless, due to its shape could not be confused with a planet for instance.

please study the images and i'll be interested in your comment.

kind regards
your witness
content.summary: Object shaped like b2 bomber or boomerang next to sun 17th may 2016

content.detailedDescription: I we in my room playing video games i looked out my window and i saw a orange light at first i thought it was a star but then i relived it was orange it hovered and moved all around in a circler motion then it disappeared then came back about five minutes later and just moved left and right i got my phone and took pictures and a video i was worried and kind of scared it disappeared in thin air
content.summary: It was a orange/red light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Event taped while we were in home celebrating three birthdays of family members. the location was 1 mile from texas corners, mi in the country.

i didn't study video for three days or so and then found it contained the object which was above the clouds and depending on altitude could be the largest ufo ever reported. this happened nearly a year ago and i would have reported it earlier except i kept trying to explain this away as a satellite, reflection, or some other object other than a ufo. i finally settled for it being a swarm satellite made by the european space agency because of its size, shape and altitude. the swarm satellite i believe is around 13 feet in height and with is used to measure and perhaps repair the earth's magnetic lines of force. if this is a swarm satellite i would have to consider whether my vehicle's windshield could have caused it to be magnified immensely and yet stranger things have happened. the only problem is its size above all the clouds it could be as huge as the city of kalamazoo or larger, or smaller, depending on its actual altitude. also being present in the video for 54 minutes + and descending slowly and then ascending later in an area where civilian passenger planes are frequently seen. it seemed unlikely that my camera would be the only object or entity to see this huge ufo in the sky.

the object appears to be a triangle at first when high in the sky, but as it descends to its lowest altitude it changes shape and definitely looks like a cone, a sharp pointed rounded object of enormous size and even at its lowest altitude is still high above the clouds which pass between it and earth. the object moved less than an inch on my flat screen horizontally during the whole video. vertically it moved very little during the whole episode. the object slowly ascended out of sight on the video. it never appears to move quickly, or erratically.

if you send me a mailing address i will send you a copy of the video on an mdhc card for your computer and you can study it for as long as you like although i hope you will inform me of what your final disposition is. i consider this video copyrighted and must be shown with my permission only, but i do give you permission to use it, and show it, as long as you give me credit for its existence. 

i am 76 years old and i take this very seriously. i also study the effects of the sun on earth during solar max and now what may be known as solar minimum. 

i am of clear mind and have worked most of my life in the field of electronics on aeronautical and missile navigation systems, qualification and evaluation testing for westinghouse electric for equipment used for nuclear reactors, as well as commercial purposes. finally i worked as a manager for mcdonnell douglas helicopter simulators maintenance crews for the apache helicopter.
content.summary: Running camera on dash pointing up video taped incident while we were celebrating three birthdays inside home

content.detailedDescription: Camping in lolo forest montana with friend we were looking at the stars and watching shooting stars when we saw the object which we first thought was a very large satellite, we both had a strange feeling about it as it flew straight across the sky above us it was moving at a steady pace and looked like a big bright star or satellite we began shining our bright flashlight at it yelling for a few seconds when it flew to the other side of the horizon, it started to dim and shimmy back and forth going in an upward direction faster and dimmer until it disappeared. neither of us had ever seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Appeared like a large close fast satellite flying straight by then shot up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
We (boyfriend and i) had just got home. sitting on the balcony watching the stars, admiring the first clear night in weeks. i was gazing at a bright star and then a big flash of bright light pulsed or phased in, much bigger, much brighter than the star. i jumped and said for my bf to look. as he turned around it happened again and in a different spot. you could barely make out its travel path when it wasn't pulsing. but you could see it moving in random patterns decending and ascending, left, right, up, down then bright pulse and it moved to another location and did it again. seemed to have yellow or orange bright white light. sphere shaped. 
i live by dfw airport. i see planes landing and taking off all night long. i have seen meteor showers, but this was neither. it was traveling and pulsing or crescendoing into super bright light, reaching a peak of lumens and then phasing out and traveling in odd patterns, rinse and repeat. (three times at least) zig zagging all through the west and northwest sky.
content.summary: Bright pulse. big sphere of light. so bright. three times, various locations and bizarrely fast  speeds then bright pulse, then movement

content.detailedDescription: Looking for pictures to take on visit to high level. stooped near train tracks on edge of town. so a jet way in distance coming towards me with the sun at my back. it went straight over head so i started taking pics. i noticed it after looking at pictures . it could be many things, an orb, an entity, or a not at all. the pictures show it all. i have more pics than it would allow me to put in files
content.summary: Saw jet overhead. recorded it and saw orb. looked at pics after and saw an orb

content.detailedDescription:
A little over a month ago, a friend of mine pointed out what she was calling the trifecta. she exclaimed to me, "there it is, it keeps following me every where i go!", after she explained her statement to me, i asked her, "are you sure it is following you, could it possibly be so high up that everywhere you go you can see it?". she thought about it for a minute, then said, "of coarse that is a possibility". i myself am a %95 blind man, i personally have not nor would i be able to see it, but, 2 weeks after that, my room mate and i were having a cigarette on the porch in the middle of the night, he at one point stopped talking for a moment then stated, "wow, that is so strange how i can see that planet wait, no... that is not a planet, that must be a plane, but wait a minute, it's not moving, what is that?" i asked him, "is it 3 or 4 lights shaped in a triangle?" he said yes confirming a second witness account of the object. he also was visiting jersey last weekend and saw these lights from there. tonight, at 9pm, his mother, uncle & aunt took notice of it when looking to see if the stars were out.

i do not listen to the news, so i do not know if other people are reporting these lights, i just know, the way this is being described to me, this would have to be massive in size.

when my room mate first came to the realization the he could not explain what he was seeing, he said, "that really freaks me out!".
content.summary: These 4 lights shaped in a triangle have been visible every night for over a month now, they are not moving at a visible rate, though, it changes positions throughout the night. the more you stare at it, it starts to wobble and emit halos

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving a truck eastbound on the i-20 in arlington texas about 23:00 hours. date unknown doing a delivery at dfw. stuck in somewhat heavy traffic. i couldn't get close to it. but noted it was much to low and moving at a good clip away from me headed south as i was moving east. it was just about at the juction of i-20 and 360 in arlington. i noted it that night in the event i would hear of a ufo report. i heard about temple mount and some other reports utah or colorado at the same time. as they tried to discredit temple mount i did not believe it was a hoax! now 06/03/2016 i started to browse to see if anyone else in the area saw anything? to my surprise i found reports in ft worth where i was coming out of when i saw the sphere. do i think the date is 1/30/2011 for sphere sighted in ft. worth. so i came forward, i would say 100's should have saw it. i think its related to temple mount truly.


i was a distance of a mile or more hard to see, but it did not fly like a craft from here. but glide or float fast low and dangerously low.

michael harris investigator 

i was driving a big rig it was to dangerous at the time to photograph. just like a ping pong ball but glowed like a star
content.summary: Seemed to glide: but like it hit turbulance moving loe over treetops fast. about the time and type ship of temple mount, i noted it like a ping pong ball but star like. moving fast on horizon with slight up and down buck as if hiting turbulance.

content.detailedDescription:
I am sending this directly from my iphone, unedited. we just took this video of a ufo.
me and two of my kids(17,20) were leaving chili's parking lot and i begin to joke with them that it was a perfect evening to see an ufo. i believe in ufo but my kids are totally sceptical about it. we jump in the car and i looked up and saw a light. i continue to joke with them and said, "look there, a ufo....Hahahaha".... but at the time it was only that, a joke. we continued to watch it as it rapidly start to approach us. then the light started to dim out and we could see a dark form over it. my son then started to literally freak out. that thing came about 300 meters from us and it was a dark squared with rounded corners thing, cruising the sky, no sound whatsoever!!!!!!!
the video doesn't reflect even 10% of the clarity of the sighting. unfortunately phone camaras are horrible, specially at dark.
but it was so clear to us. it seemed to be the size of a car just crusing there, with almost the same color of the background.
my son is still shacking. he never believed in anything paranormal.
i am available to give details if you need.

tks.

evandro reis
batavia, il
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White light in sky became red-orange then dimmed ouy and a dark object became visible.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room. i didn't notice the ship until after i was shot. i had burning all over and was paralyzed when i was able to move i lifted my hand up and white energy was beaming out also there was static coming off like electricity coming out of my hands. specks of light as well (white and silver).  it was very painful but i am getting used to it because its not the first time this has happened. on the ceiling there was this swirling cloudy looking stuff which had beams coming down that were entering me.  when it was done the energy looked like it was being sucked back up through the ceiling. i got up and went to get some water and i saw my cat outside looking up. i thought he saw a bird or something on the roof but there was this ship above my house it was goldish copper looking and it was shaped like a v no body just a boomerang look to it. i looked at it and thanked it then it shot away super fast.  it effected me physically and mentally as well. i am stronger than before and my senses are more sharp! my telepathy and telekinesis seems to have improved as well. i am able to do emps with more accuracy now and my weather skills are becoming stronger! i think they are programming me to be some kind of hybrid. i am not sure if this is a military experiment or extraterrestrial.  if i told you what i do and showed you our ships you won't take me seriously. you just aren't ready i suppose.  i wanted you to get a first hand account of one of my "upgrade" experiences.  i tell air force space command about all of my encounters as well as what our projects are for this planet. no one seems to want to investigate me which is odd and kinda verifies that i am a military experiment.  i can knock helicopters around and they don't care! i have knocked out rockets from entering our airspace....Nothing happened. some of my ships have even knocked military aircraft out in the sky (during our weather work) but no one cares! why is that?  we are currently working on bringing in several storms (as we have been) this is to cool your planet down. i can't tell you anymore because its top secret so to speak.  however, i can tell you this there are many ships surveying the planet, the sun, and the inner solar system. we also have millions of hybrids on earth all developing at different rates. that energy i spoke of is used to alter the body's molecular chemistry to advance them and prepare them for the next phase in the earth's changes.  its all part of an experiment to see how far the physical vessels can go and how much of our energy they can take before shutting down. we are also preparing your planet for our touch down. clearly we are here but we work in a distance so that you do not panic.  we will not save you for you must learn to be responsible.  when your kind have mastered repairing earth we will allow you to further explore the universe. we open the doors little by little with each achievement and effort we have observed on ground as well as above. sort of like a reward. you save a species we allow another piece of your space garbage to look around. if you go too far in exploration we destroy the object. i think i have said enough here. i am a ground keeper i observe and report the activity on earth and also give suggestions as to what changes need to occur in specific areas to further improvements and or expose areas that need work.  i also ....No i won't say that nevermind. oh look a storm!! yay!! okay time to go. i just wanted to open the doorway a little more for you guys so you know a little bit about our project here. again still not sure if it is military or not. did i say your military? no....I was talking about ours. ;) good day. i'll give you some pictures but not sure if it really matters. our ships aren't boomeranged shaped though ours are diamond or star orbs. so that boomerang one threw me off unless that was one of the ones i upgraded...Hmmmm i forgot about that! ha! woops i guess if you want to really investigate me you can take a gander at my facebook page  and go through my files most of my stuff i purposely put on facebook because it is public and for those who see they shall find. you should see my conversations i have there is so much more proof in there then you would ever need! lmao but you won't and you probably cant.  if you look at the soho and lasco c3 sometimes you will see a blip of our ships at work putting in new installments for the sun. oh if you only knew. i can't fit any more on here sorry.
content.summary: It shot me with some white plasma stuff i wouldn't have seen it if my cat wasn't outside staring at it

content.detailedDescription: I like to view nasa live on youtube and while listening to sunnaroe and was doing so when all of a sudden this thing appears in the center of the screen and descends to the earth's surface.I had taken a screens hot of a normal scene watching clouds pass.I then took a few screenshots of the ufo.It descended in about 40 seconds. look for yourself and zoom in.If this turns out to be other worldly please mention me to stephen hawking for my reward .Thanks for all of your time.Enjoy
content.summary: I'm watching nasa live on youtube and listening to sunnaroe when all of a sudden this thing appears out of nowhere and sinks to the earth.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was coming from washington dc. and going to new york. i was in my car.
2.I had seen brightened light attracted me there. and i observed it for 10-15 seconds.
3.I noticed it in when i saw right side  window. 
4.When i saw that  it was steady then in just 2-3 seconds it moved to west side and it moved again in east side. after 4-5 second it moved again in west side. and it disappeared. 
5.I was just observing that thing because i got it that was ufo. i was shocked. it was area of highways.
6. it suddunly moved to west side and i was watching that but it was gone.
i could not take a photograph because that all happened very quickly.
content.summary: It was shining with lights, and its changing its directions quickly which airoplane or helicopters cant.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from a corner store down the street,  walking on the right side of the road when i see pitch black helicopters crossing the city. so i looked up in the direction they were heading and i see 4 lights that appeared to be moving in a horizontal direction. and then i knoticed a 5th orb appeared put of complete darkness and moved up and down in between the 4 lights. they were angled down towards the ground on one side and pointing to the sky on the other side. at that moment i took a picture of 5 orbs. the center orb was lower then the rest and was apparently not connected to the rest. on a normal jight you would see planes coming in and out of phoenix,  this night i saw nothing but 2 black helicopters.
content.summary: These 5 orbs moved in a circular motion and then just disappeared one by one.

content.detailedDescription: While on the deck star gazing with my son, we began seeing bright flashes of light in the northern portion of sky. as if a headlight was being turned on and back off. much much brighter than any star in the sky. few and far between at first, however over the next hour, we seen several flashes similar in diferant areas of the sky. flashes lasting 1-2 seconds each. close to midnight, about 45 degrees above the west horizon, several flashes in quick sucession, roughly in the same area, out of which we watched, what i would describe as a falling star, fly directly overhead toward the east and out of site. seemed slower than a falling star, no flashing lighs, just a dim glow.
content.summary: Bright white flashes, flying object

content.detailedDescription:
In my home. i have my doors open to cool my house which is without ac right now.  i stood in front of my side door to cool off and noticed a light flash above my neighbors house so i looked up and noticed 2 lights close together and as i watched another light would blink between them.  i realized they couldn't be stars cause stars aren't that close together and the lights were brighter than stars.  i step out my door at night to cool of cause my ac is out and last night was the stangest of all, i was looking for the stationary lights when a single white light appears sets there for a bit then gets brighter and instantly zooms of fasts than a bullet.

the stationary objects would resemble a pencil with a light at each end and a periotic flash of light perfectly centered between them.  i was able to observe this from mightnight til the rising of the sun obscured them.
content.summary: Dule lights occasionally 1 blinking between the two, not stars, stationary all night long.  one above my house the other closer to middletown.  stars change position with earth movement these don't move clouds block view.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend in the beth i heard and sound, that i never heard before, sorry my english is noodles good for this, but me and my girlfriend was very scared an saw lights and flying objects. this object flying over the houses and trees in straight to an atomkraftwerke (atomic building) 
and 5minutes after we saw the ufo, we saw black cars and jeeps on the street, that drive the same way like the ufo
content.summary: It was scary, and very loud at this moment

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at the images from the solar and heliospherical observatory satellite on 4th june 2016 when i saw two objects near the sun.

i screen captured them, then did a close up analysis which i will include as attachments.

i am amazed to see they re artificial in appearance.

one in particular seems to be shaped very much as i would imagine a spaceship to be with one bulbous front part and a bigger rear and what looks like a tail section pointing up.

although blurry the artificiality of these structures are evident.

they are mere specks next to the sun, but would be enormous in relation to planet earth.

the second object is almost like a 'lawn roller' in shape with a big cylinder and a distinct thin appendage coming out the back. enhancing the image seems to show vapour coming off it. given the extreme heat near the sun, i am not surprised.

please see attached images and i look forward to some feedback.

kind regards
(witness)
content.summary: Two giant ufo's near sun

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on a deck viewing the ocean in buxton nc with girlfriend.  saw a brilliant light overhead, moved to the ne at high rate of speed, and vanished on horizon.  5 minutes later, appered at zenith, moving south, appeared to rapidly accelerate straight up and vanish.  2-3 minutes later, it appeared over the ocean moving se, for about 3-4 seconds and abruptly vanished.

chrystal clear night, before the moon rose.  very clear.  was the brightest object in the sky, with the next brightest object being mars.  no strobing, blinking or sound presented.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant light. steady low.  high speed. sped to horizon.  appeared overhead less than 5 minutes later.

content.detailedDescription:
I was preparing to take a walk and was standing on our third floor back porch gathering garbage to take down to the dumpsters when what i thought was a large hawk or raven caught my eye in the eastern sky at about tree top level, perhaps 6 blocks away at most. i looked directly at the object and noticed it was not a bird and that it was rotating in an irregular fashion.
i called to my wife. she joined me on back porch and also saw the object.
then a second object rose from a position along the pathway of the first object from behind trees. by this time the first object was at 35 degrees above horizon still traveling southward. the second ascended to the same altitude and the two objects went behind buildings and out of sight.
the objects appeared to be of identical size and structure. both jet black, with edges occasionally flashing silver, bright light as the sun reflected off of it; diamond or rhombus shaped but perhaps actually square. there may have been an upturned edging around the entire object's surface, the way the light shone off both the objects. 
the objects appeared too large to be mylar silver balloons. they did not behave like balloons. especially the second object, which ascended with apparent "purpose" to the precise altitude of the first before continuing southward in tandem.
content.summary: One object proceeded from n to s in eastern sky. second identical object ascended to meet it and they continued s. in eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1971 near or just outside of gainesville florida, while walking in a lightly wooded area with my girlfriend, i momentarily stopped walking to turn away from the breeze to light a cigarette. my girlfriend was standing about 4 feet from me. as i had my back turned to her while 
lighting the cigarette. she said, "i have never felt like this before".
her tone was calm but i could tell from the tone of her voice, she was referring to something that was completely non-sequitur to any conversation
we may have been having previously. my instant reaction was that of 'no idea what she means'. i turned to look at her, and saw her mouth slightly agape and eyes looking up over my right shoulder.  i turned to look up in the direction she was looking and within a second i felt a wave of a feeling of well-being come over me, consuming my entire perception. i then
saw what appeared to be parallel waves approximately 1 to 2 feet in width,
with a total combined width of perhaps 100 feet hovering 20 to 30 feet above me.  the waves were 'rippling' within these segments, and i could "see" a very regular pattern. the 'light' was invisible but i could sense a series of colors in the spectrum, not visually, but more physically.
the intensity of the overall wave was overwhelmingly obvious. the phenomenon lasted, it seemed, about 3 to 10 seconds. i turned to look at her again and without uttering one single word, we both turned and continued on our walk. there was no thought of discussing it with her, and she did not mention anything at all either.  we never discussed the incident and i had absolutely no thoughts of questioning her as to what she experienced either. it was as if it did not happen at all, but here i am 45 years later still wondering what the phenomenon was.

there are esp overtones in my life, having been tutored by a past student
of george colby within a year of the incident at cassadega, fla. later in life i crossed paths with ingo swann and a few other interesting people,
but never discussed with incident with anyone at all.
content.summary: Witnessed a pulsating wave, rainbow spectrum, invisible light, very close range, 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I saw a v shaped  very fast moving object without any noice around 10.30 pm over tirupattur , vellore district , india on 5th june 2016. it moved very fast in and disappeared in 20 seconds. someone will say i am crazy but my wife, daughter iniyal and cousin nithil am stand witness. it like flock of birds flying in v shape, bright ivory colour.
content.summary: I saw a v shaped  very fast moving object without any noice around 10.30 pm over tirupattur , vellore district , india on 5th june 2016. it moved very fast in and disappeared in 20 seconds. someone will say i am crazy but my wife, daughter iniyal cousin

content.detailedDescription:
I took the dogs to bassi falls, there was thunder and lighting as always i took many photographs, it was not until i was back at my cabin that evening looking over the photographs that i seen this thing in the clouds, may be nothing at all, but sure looks like something, i attached 2 photographs, the original and one i cropped to see the object better!
please tell me what you think it is?
content.summary: Seen something in a photo i took, something i did not see at the time i took the photograph

content.detailedDescription: I left charleston on my way to kingsport, tn. i took 77 south. at approximately 9:45pm, and on a straight stretch of road, i briefly looked up and through my sunroof. i couldn't help but notice a cookie cutter shape cut out from beneath the moon. at first, i thought my eyes were deceiving me, so i shifted my head in case something was on the glass and i continued to see the object. i pulled the car over, (1st of 3 times i pulled off of the road, and stopped. i opened the sunroof and continued to notice the object. i contacted friends and family members near huntington, wv and also a friend working out of town in dc. i also contacted a friend in charleston who looked at the moon with his daughter's new high powered telescope and none of them could see the object. this made me think the object was closer to earth than just it had appeared. i attempted to take pictures during the failing light and also later but all i had was a samsung galaxy phone and had to rely on digital zoom which is not sharp. i noticed that the object appeared to wash out when i took pictures. i should say the several cars also pulled off the road and were swerving all over the road about 20 minutes after i first noticed the object. it is my opinion that several people were also seeing the object. during the course of an hour, the object appeared to float directly beneath the moon, and slightly rotate at a 7:00 to 2:00 position. then it eventually returned to where it was originally. i only have one photo that shows something below the moon. i zoomed in and drew a line around it to show you what it looked like. look for the outline. i must say that it was extremely black and very noticeable during my drive. when i passed out of wv and arrived at wythville, va, i changed directions and took route 81, heading west. i noticed that the object disappeared, but only for about 5 minutes. it reappeared for approximately 15 minutes and then disappeared.
content.summary: Huge dark oval appeared to cover bottom right of moon. hovered in same spot for well over hour.

content.detailedDescription: I'm posting this. a friend of mine was taking a photo of the morning sunrise from work. he posted this photo on fackebook. i noticed this in the photo .
content.summary: Tjis is a friends pic that he was taking of the morning sun rise then noticed lights.

content.detailedDescription: So me and my friends ray and tyler were all at a local park called harrison park in riverside ca, at about 8:30 on 6/4/16. me and tyler were sitting on the swings on our phones and ray was sitting on a bench about 10 ft behind us. all of a sudden ray gets up and runs over where there isn't any trees covering the sky and he yelled at us to come over. so me and tyler both ran over there and he was trying to get us to see a little dim ball of light. after about 10 seconds i saw it, then another 5 seconds tyler saw it and we were all 3 watching this dim ball of light move in a diagonal pattern moving nw very fast. then out of nowhere there was a big ball of light that flashes really bright and really fast. and it was gone. what we all three were watching was gone. we started freaking out like little girls. nobody knew what we saw. it was nothing we could logically explain. we all did research the next morning and couldn't find anything. we all saw a ufo.
content.summary: Dim, fast moving, ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Clear sky, happened to look up and saw bright roundish object at a very high altitude moving from east to west. shape was similar to a walnut,  but it had a dark area across it. being an aviation enthusiast with apprix 80 hrs of pilot training, this was not a jet. watched the object for approximately 1 minute as it slowed and then turned in a flight path like a candy cane. it the completly stopped and hovered for approximately 1 additional minute. i looked away briefly and when i looked back it was gone. again, object very high, if it was around 30k-40k then it would have been at least 300-400 feet long, perhaps larger. distnct shape, not a plane, was probably initially moving 400-500 mph in straight line, not a balloon. unknown, very curious. i was in centennial  co, would guess object over parker co.
content.summary: Looked like a walnut shape, white with dark area, 30-40k feet up, moved then hovered stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the front yard trying to capture a picture of the cottonwood floating in the air. it was bright and i was only looking through my phone, not directly at the sky.  i looked at my images immediately after taking them. i have a series of 3 shots all taken within seconds of each other.

picture #1 is a small orb rising from thethe north west. it is small with no aura.
picture #2 is the orb increased in size surrounded by a green aura, surrounded by a rose colored aura.
picture #3 is a crisper version of picture #2
content.summary: Orb with growing aura rising in sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the 5th of june 2016 i stood with my 3 year old daughter at the hudson river pier next to the uss intrepid.
i looked over the hudson at two helicopters flying over the new jersey side of the hudson. i saw what first i thought was a person parachuting down over new jersey. it looked like two objects and they seemed attached but it wasn't moving. i watched for a about 15 seconds and it remained stationary. i got my iphone out and started filming. the two objects then seemed to disappear into the clouds. i watched the footage later and saw not only the original object i filmed but also another object shoot past the spot the original object disappeared (at 20secs). i seems to be traveling very fast and changing direction.
content.summary: 2 objects fade while another object flies by quickly
